results.title: [Plasma endothelin level in hypertensive patients receiving standard anti-hypertensive therapy with or without statins].
results.journal: Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@EH@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were randomly divided into routine treatment group (calcium antagonists, ACEI, diuretics, beta-receptor blocker for 8 weeks) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ intervention group (routine treatment + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/d for 8 weeks), plasma @GENE_MFSD11 @GENE_79157 @@@ET@@@ concentrations before and after drug intervention were measured.

citations.NLM: Liu XH, Li YF, Lai CL, Ji YR, Zhao JQ. [Plasma endothelin level in hypertensive patients receiving standard anti-hypertensive therapy with or without statins]. Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi. 2009 Sep;37(9):800-3. PMID: 20128377

results.title: [Simvastatin versus gemfibrozil in the treatment of primary hypercholesterolemia in hypertensive patients treated with hydrochlorothiazide].
results.text_hl: The efficacy and the tolerability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (a inhibitor of HGM-CoA reductase) with that of @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@ (a @CHEMICAL_fibric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C010285 @@@fibric acid@@@ derivative, which can reduce the VLDL level) were compared in a placebo-controlled study in 2 groups of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with primary @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@ and mild-to-moderate @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@.

citations.NLM: Berioli S, Bentivoglio M, Conti R, Osanna RA, Savino K, Zollino L, Corea L. [Simvastatin versus gemfibrozil in the treatment of primary hypercholesterolemia in hypertensive patients treated with hydrochlorothiazide]. Cardiologia. 1990 Apr;35(4):335-40. PMID: 2245435

results.title: Effect of statin therapy added to ACE-inhibitors on blood pressure control and endothelial functions in normolipidemic hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS: This randomized prospective study consisted of 56 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with newly diagnosed @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@.
